description: An on-machine AI agent that automates engineering tasks from start to finish - GUI version
notes: Goose is an extensible AI agent that goes beyond code suggestions.
It can build entire projects, write and execute code, debug failures, and orchestrate workflows.
This is a nonportable application that requires admin rights to install.

script: if (!(is_admin)) { error "$app requires admin rights to $cmd"; break }
